SELECT upper(ts.TABLE_CATALOG) catalog, upper(ts.TABLE_SCHEMA) "schema", upper(ts.TABLE_NAME) "name", ts.TABLE_COMMENT "comment" FROM information_schema.TABLES ts WHERE ts.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schema}
AND ts.TABLE_NAME like #{name}

SELECT upper(cs.COLUMN_NAME) "name", cs.ORDINAL_POSITION ordinal, upper(cs.COLUMN_TYPE) type, upper(cs.DATA_TYPE) dataType, cs.COLUMN_DEFAULT defValue, cs.IS_NULLABLE nullable, cs.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH length, cs.NUMERIC_PRECISION percision, cs.NUMERIC_SCALE scale, upper(cs.COLUMN_KEY) "key", cs.EXTRA extra, cs.COLUMN_COMMENT "comment" FROM information_schema.COLUMNS cs WHERE cs.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schema} AND cs.TABLE_NAME = #{name} ORDER BY cs.ORDINAL_POSITION
